Package UserCode.Components

Interface Summary
IComponent IComponent defines how a component should act and the main methods it should implement in order to function as intended with the IBehaviour pets included within the aquarium
 

Class Summary
Feed Feed defines the behaviour of a components that a pet should include if it is to 'eat', the IBehaviour scale is then increased
FeedTest The test class FeedTest for testing the IComponent Feed production class
FoodFall FoodFall defines the behaviour of an IComponent of a pet that is defined as fish food in an aquarium.
FoodFallTest The test class FoodFallTest for testing the production class FoodFall.
MoveDiag MoveDiag defines a movement behaviour which acts upon an IBehaviour so that it moves diagonally direction within the boundaries set in construction.
MoveDiagTest The test class MoveDiagTest.
MoveHorizontal MoveHorizontal defines a movement behaviour by considering the boundary it is placed within and used by a pet to move horizontally within those parameters
MoveHorizontalTest The test class MoveHorizontalTest.
MoveVertically MoveVertically defines the behaviour of an IComponent used by a pet that wishes to move vertically.
MoveVerticallyTest The test class MoveVerticallyTest.
Preditor Preditor defines the behaviour of a components that a pet should include if it is defined as a preditor.
PreditorTest The test class PreditorTest to test the IComponent Preditor Test Conditions 1) Construction: all fields are initialised as expected and checked once via the object bench using the Initialise method 2) componentAction(): check that this method calls the private method feed and the scale is increased
Prey Prey defines the behaviour of an IComponent implementation to be used by pets that are 'eaten' by a preditor.
PreyTest The test class PreyTest used for testing the Prey IComponent class
RequestBubble RequestBubble describes the behaviour of an IComponent that is used by a pet that requires to emmit a bubble.
RequestBubbleTest The test class RequestBubbleTest for testing the production class RequestBubble implementation of the IComponent Test Conditions 1) Construction: all fields are initialised as expected and checked once via the object bench using the Initialise method 2) getUpdate(): check that the method is returning the correct position of the IBehaviour which request a bubble 3) addObserver().
RotateObj RotateObj class defines a IComponent implementation which changes the y orientation of an IBehaviour
RotateObjTest The test class RotateObjTest for testing the production class RotateObj Test Conditions 1) Construction: all fields are initialised as expected and checked once via the object bench using the Initialise method 2) componentAction(): Test that the method flips the y orientation of the image set in the _token
